thread.title: J. Cole Announces New ‘4 Your Eyez Only’ HBO Documentary
thread.title_full: J. Cole Announces New ‘4 Your Eyez Only’ HBO Documentary

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: J. Cole Announces New ‘4 Your Eyez Only’ HBO Documentary
text:
Next month, J. Cole will be premiering his second documentary with HBO . According to Entertainment Weekly , the special, titled J. Cole: 4 Your Eyez Only, A Dreamville Film , will center around the NC artist’s 2016 project, 4 Your Eyez Only , showcasing Cole performing tunes from the record.
“The documentary promises to illustrate how their struggles over viable housing, voting laws for felons, integration, and more mirror the frustrations felt across the nation,” says EW .
Directed by J. Cole and Scott Lazer, the feature will also highlight footage from cities like Baton Rouge and Fayetteville, North Carolina where Cole is from.
J. Cole: 4 Your Eyez Only, A Dreamville Film premieres on HBO April 15 at 10 p.m. EST.
